mapper.sql: number_id, member_id, target_amount, title, help_times, cash, rescue_type, province_id, city_id, examine, createdat, updatedat
mapper.insert: insert into xa_rescue (member_id, target_amount, title, help_times, cash, rescue_type, province_id, city_id, createdat,examine, updatedat, Instructions) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{helpTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rescueType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{examine,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{instructions,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update xa_rescue
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_amount = #{targetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
help_times = #{helpTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cash = #{cash,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rescue_type = #{rescueType,jdbcType=CHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
examine = #{examine,jdbcType=CHAR},
createdat = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatedat = #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Instructions = #{instructions,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where number_id = #{numberId}

update xa_rescue set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_amount = #{targetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, help_times = #{helpTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cash = #{cash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rescue_type = #{rescueType,jdbcType=CHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, examine = #{examine,jdbcType=CHAR}, createdat = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedat = #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Instructions = #{instructions,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where number_id = #{numberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update xa_rescue set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_amount = #{targetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, help_times = #{helpTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cash = #{cash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rescue_type = #{rescueType,jdbcType=CHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, examine = #{examine,jdbcType=CHAR}, createdat = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedat = #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where number_id = #{numberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT xr.number_id as numberId,xr.title as title ,xr.rescue_type as rescueType,xr.help_times as helpTimes,xr.member_id as memberId,xrp.picture as picture from xa_rescue xr INNER JOIN xa_rescue_pictures xrp ON xr.number_id = xrp.mutuala_id where xr.examine = 1 group by xr.number_id
